medical_history.chief_complaint: Sharp abdominal pain radiating to the back with associated nausea and non-bilious emesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began with similar pain previously but less severe. The pain became more severe yesterday afternoon. Denies association with food.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Gastritis, Hypertension, Hypercholesterolemia, Morbid obesity, ILD possibly statin related. Previous surgeries: bilateral TKA and laparoscopic tubal ligation.
